about_the_game:
Shopkeeper Chaos and Co-op Adventures Await!

Step into the world of Mystic Market, where heroes rise to face evil—but you're not one of them! In this co-op fantasy shop sim, you’re the shopkeepers, crafting and managing goods to supply to the adventurers as they battle the forces of evil.

Key Features:

  • Co-op Shopkeeping Chaos: Team up with friends to run shops like the Forge, Tavern, Apothecary, and Armory. Race against time to fulfill orders and craft powerful gear through fun, fast-paced mini-games.

  • Twitch Chat Integration: Your chat members are the heroes! Watch them embark on quests, grow stronger, and return with tales of victory (or failure). Not streaming? No problem—NPC heroes will fill the gap!

  • Real-Time Story Progression: The adventure plays out live as your heroes take your crafted equipment off into terrific battles (that you as a lowly shopkeeper will of course never see). Your crafted items directly impact the fate of the heroes. One lucky viewer may even get the chance to slay the boss and see their victory roll the credits for everyone!

  • Persistent Characters: Hero characters level up, gain money, and request higher-quality items which you must fulfill as they progress through the game. Every viewer can have their hero persist across different stream sessions.

  • Interactive Mini-Games: Each shop has unique crafting mini-games, testing your timing, precision, and logic. The quality of your products depends on your skills!

  • Upgrade Your Shops: Each day ends with a chance to upgrade your shop and tools, ensuring you're always on top of customer demands.

  • Dynamic Chat Influence: Viewers can cheer, subscribe, or vote to add buffs, debuffs, or other chaos, making every session dynamic and unpredictable.

  • A Little Fantasy, A Lot of Chaos: All the questing happens off-screen, but the impact of your work is felt in the stories and feedback your heroes bring back. The real adventure is in the shop!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4690 / Intel i3-10100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD RX 460 / Intel Arc A380
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Enjoy lighthearted, low-poly, co-op fantasy shop sim Mystic Market. Support adventuring heroes and make them become legends by crafting their weapons, gear, potions, and more in low fantasy high chaos shop management.
